nodes.text: T9-B2 was a astromech droid used by the Rift Alliance during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY it was used to transmit the hologram of Tai Cordan, who assisted Barsen'thor and the Rift Alliance Coalition Forces in the planning their assault on the Guardian Hold Four.
T9-B2 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Consular class mission on the planet Corellia.
